scripts.docs: shadow-cljs clj-run docs/build && cp docs/default.css docs/build/css/default.css
scripts.css: cp node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css ./public/css/normalize.css && cp -pr node_modules/@kpn-style/bundle/base/ui-icon public/css/ui-icon && cp -pr node_modules/@kpn-style/bundle/base/typography public/css/typography && sassc ./style/kpn_theme.scss > ./public/css/kpn_theme.css
scripts.clean: rm -rf ~/.clojure && rm -rf ~/.m2 && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf public/js && rm -f public/css/*.css && rm -rf public/css/ui-icon && rm -rf public/css/typography && scripts/generate_maven_config.sh && yarn install && yarn css
